info.first_title: International Conference 'Quality Assurance in Compliance with International Standards in Turkmenistan'

first_block.text: The International Conference 'Quality Assurance in Compliance with International Standards in Turkmenistan' will be held on April 29-30, in Ashgabat.

In the era of globalization, where compliance with international standards is becoming a crucial condition for success in global markets, the organization of specialized events like the International Conference 'Quality Assurance in Compliance with International Standards in Turkmenistan' gains particular importance.

On April 29-30, participants will gather in Ashgabat on a unique platform to discuss key trends in product certification and labelling, exchange experiences, and implement best practices. This event will bring together leading experts, business representatives, and government officials to collectively discuss strategies for improving product quality and ensuring its compliance with international standards.

info.second_title: Why is this important for your business?

second_block.text: With competition growing and demands for higher quality increasing, certification has become a vital part of successful business operations.
Product certification – whether in safety, environmental concerns, or technology – opens access to new markets, builds consumer trust, and strengthens competitive advantages.

Global standards dictate new rules: manufacturers are required to adhere to strict certification procedures, making participation in such forums a key step for updating knowledge, establishing valuable contacts, and mastering modern solutions in certification.
